name: Cannonball Run (VZ200, VZ300)
description:
Cannon Ball Run for the VZ200/VZ300 computers. (concept game)
Game idea taken from the screenshot on the cover of the Vtech Laser210 computer box. This screen shot was not on the VZ200 or VZ300 computer box.

Concept game showing that the VZ / Laser computers are capable of playing 1-bit music within the game itself.
Key controls:
: car go left.
: car go right.

Thats all there is. Nothing more, nothing else. 
Sound should play through the VZ/Laser internal piezo speaker.
Sound does play through the likes of the 'VZEM' emulator.
